snippet: Americans cut back on soda at an accelerated pace last year, extending a slow retreat from the category that began nearly a decade ago....

headline.print_headline: Soda Sales in US Decline at Faster Pace
headline.main: Soda Sales in US Decline at Faster Pace

lead_paragraph: Americans cut back on soda at an accelerated pace last year, extending a slow retreat from the category that began nearly a decade ago.
